questions.question: 1) When serially connected, find the voltage produced when anolyte is ETP water with Chroococcus species, Catholyte KMNO4, MFC unit is 2, Anode: Cathode is Aluminium: Copper.

2) When connected in parallel, the value of current produced in 1 MFC unit, 2 MFC unit and 3 MFC unit when anolyte is ETP water with Chroococcus species, Catholyte KMNO4, MFC unit is 2, Anode: Cathode is Aluminium: Copper
3) When serially connected, find the voltage produced when anolyte is sewage water with Chroococcus species, Catholyte KMNO4, MFC unit is 3, Anode: Cathode is Aluminium: Copper.

4) When connected in parallel, the value of current produced in 1 MFC unit, 2 MFC unit and 3 MFC unit when anolyte is sewage water with Chroococcus species, Catholyte KMNO4, MFC unit is 2, Anode: Cathode is Aluminium: Copper
5) In the simulator, when connected parallelly, the cumulative current production is indicated by:
6) In the simulator, when connected in series, the cumulative voltage production is indicated by

answers.c: Change in the color of the anolyte
answers.d: Change in the color of catholyte
